search_term: Find the official pricing page URL for Coassemble (coassemble.com). Only provide the exact URL to the pricing page, not a summary of pricing information.
response_text: The official pricing page for Coassemble can be found here: [https://coassemble.com/pricing](https://coassemble.com/pricing)【3:0†source】.

extracted_content.content:
[](https://coassemble.com/)

*   [Pricing](https://coassemble.com/pricing)

Plans & pricing

Free

For everyone$0forever

[Get started](https://coassemble.com/build)

* * *

Free features you’ll love

*   Unlimited courses
*   Unlimited AI create options

Solo

L&D, HR, Consultants, Course Sellers and Educators$10per month (billed yearly at $120)

Billed monthly Billed yearly Save 50%

[Upgrade](https://coassemble.com/signin)

* * *

All Free features, and

*   Remove all Coassemble branding
*   Payment links (3% application fee + [Stripe transaction fees](https://stripe.com/pricing))

Team

HR, operations and customer service teams$15per month (billed yearly at $180)

Billed monthly Billed yearly Save 50%

[Upgrade](https://coassemble.com/signin)

* * *

All Solo features, and

*   3 Creators
*   Payment links (2% application fee + [Stripe transaction fees](https://stripe.com/pricing))
*   Course folders
*   Individual insights

Business

HR, Product, CS and Marketing teams with mid sized business$25per month (billed yearly at $300)

Billed monthly Billed yearly Save 50%

[Upgrade](https://coassemble.com/signin)

* * *

All Team features, and

*   10 Creators
*   Payment links (1% application fee + [Stripe transaction fees](https://stripe.com/pricing))
*   SCORM Reports
*   Multi-domain SCORM hosting
*   Custom logos on courses
*   Headless
*   Collections

Transform your training with AI
-------------------------------

*   Convert your documents to interactive courses
*   Generate a course about your topic
*   Have a quiz generated for your course
*   Match images with your content

[Create course](https://coassemble.com/build)

Things you might be wondering

7,000+ Companies trusted us so far 🤝

Engage your team, customers, partners, students, anybody who needs to learn something.

4.7 Rating

Start creating today!

*   Create unlimited courses
*   Give unlimited access
*   Share anywehre
*   Make learners happy
*   Be proud

The best online course creation tool with plans that suit you and your teams needs, including free, business and enterprise plans.
